title: I Broke Into The U.S. Security Convention
description: In this video, Max Fosh documents his attempt to break into a U.S. security convention to see if he can fool the attendees.
summary: Max Fosh tries to sneak into a U.S. security convention and interacts with attendees while pretending to be a security expert.
payoff: The payoff comes when Max successfully convinces some attendees that he is a security expert, despite his lack of credentials, showcasing the absurdity of the situation.
